segments.text: I'm just observing this kitchen scene unfolding before me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The daylight streams in through the window, illuminating the space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman is diligently drying a plate by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely focused on her task, almost meditative.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see a steady stream of water flowing over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a considerable puddle on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress is already getting wet, yet she shows no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so unaware of what's happening right at their feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her right, a stack of clean dishes awaits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside the window looks so peaceful and orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the small disaster brewing indoors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll realize before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire scene feels oddly suspended in time.
segments.speaker: PAR
